moves.4... d6 5. d3 Nf6 6. Nbd2 b5 7. Be2 Be7: Starting to attack on the King´s side.
moves.10... Qd7 11. f4 Bxh3: Nice one! It may have compensation, at least, draw looks better than letting white do f5
moves.12. gxh3 Qxh3 13. Rf3: Now traffic will not allow white to find a good defence. In this position I spent more time trying to find adequate spots for my defending pieces.
moves.13... Qh4 14. Qe1: Trying to exchange queens and simplify the position. Maybe f5 was stronger
moves.14... Qh5 15. Rg3 Qh6 16. fxe5: Now, this is a crucial point. Blocking with f5 instead of taking seemed safer, but on the other hand I also wanted to activate my bishop in b2.
moves.16... Nxe5: But also black activates his pieces
moves.17. Bxe5 dxe5 18. Ndf3 Nh5 19. Rg4 Nf4 2: AS mentioned, too much traffice here for white.
moves.20... f5: Excellent! Activating f-column. White looks worse and worse with every passing move.
moves.23. Ng4: Trying to fish something in the confusion of the blitz game.
moves.23... Qe6:
